name: KNOT Offshore Partners LP
description: KNOT Offshore Partners LP is a leading provider of offshore floating production and storage solutions. Founded in 2013 and based in the United States, the company offers a unique fleet of offshore vessels and services that cater to the oil and gas industry's needs, particularly in harsh environments. KNOT Offshore focuses primarily on the operation of shuttle tankers and floating storage units (FSUs), which are essential for transporting hydrocarbons from offshore fields to onshore facilities. The company operates a modern fleet designed for efficiency and safety, ensuring reliable service to its customers. KNOT Offshore Partners is committed to high operational standards and environmental compliance, reflecting its dedication to sustainability in offshore operations. The firm has developed long-term contracts with major oil companies, positioning itself as a trusted partner in offshore logistics. With a strategic focus on growth through acquisitions and organic expansion, KNOT Offshore aims to enhance its service offerings and maintain a competitive edge in the dynamic energy sector.
